abstract: Soccer Roundup; Barcelona is held to scoreless tie by Sevilla, letting Real Madrid take lead in Spanish league with a 4-0 rout of Malaga; other soccer news noted.
snippet: Barcelona was held to a scoreless tie by Sevilla when Lionel Messi was stopped on a penalty kick in injury time.
lead_paragraph: Barcelona was held to a scoreless tie by Sevilla when Lionel Messi was stopped on a penalty kick in injury time.

headline.main: Real Madrid Slips Into First With a Hat Trick by Ronaldo
headline.print_headline: Real Madrid Slips Into First With a Hat Trick by Ronaldo
headline.seo: Ronaldo’s Hat Trick Carried Real Madrid Into First
